metadata.title: 1002 Boundary
metadata.description: Data Type: Boundaries;  This dataset provides a digitized legal boundary for the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge as interpreted from the Federal Register. This data is current to 1995. Accuracy of these lines are to the nearest meter for arcs that follow section, township lines and aliquot part descriptions.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: This dataset provides a digitized legal refuge boundary of the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge as described in the Federal Register. These data are appropriate for a variety of resource evaluation purposes.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Unknown

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
